text: How stable is CUDA#master supposed to be against 1.6-beta1 ? Should I be reporting issues I come across, or is it too early / already known?

elements.text: How stable is CUDA#master supposed to be against 1.6-beta1 ? Should I be reporting issues I come across, or is it too early / already known?

text: yes, should work, and is the only target tested by CI. so do file issues.

elements.text: yes, should work, and is the only target tested by CI. so do file issues.

text: I'm using 1.6-nightly though: the latest build from the release-1.6 branch

elements.text: I'm using 1.6-nightly though: the latest build from the release-1.6 branch

text: Thanks, actually looks like most of my issues were somehow caused by an out of date version of Revise (I think was deleting some GPU-related methods on accident?). With that fixed, I haven't run into anything yet
